item.title: Learn, todo and done 8-12/6/20
item.description: Learn Docker PostgreSQL OOP progress Yii1.1 framework utterances Todo Problem For Issue #291, the codes in local develop branch is huge different from that in production server, a cascade of changes will be needed. Yii1.1 blog update Home page from /site/index to /site/post in /layouts/main.php Done Fixed issue #421 Fixed issue #441 Issue #291 Reference How to add Utterances in Hugo post utterances
